data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Seongnam close to the penalty box.
In the minute 3, Can Seongnam capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Busan's half?
Seongnam drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In Seongnam a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 7, Busan takes a corner from the right.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Busan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 12, Throw-in Seongnam.
Goal kick for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Throw-in high up the field for Seongnam in Seongnam.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Busan in their own half.
Corner awarded to Busan.
Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 25, Seongnam have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Seongnam.
Busan have a goal kick.
In the minute 28, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Seongnam is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Busan goal kick.
In the minute 32, Busan take a 0-1 lead thanks to Lee Dong-jun.
Busan needs to be cautious. Seongnam have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seongnam.
In the minute 37, Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Seongnam takes a corner from the right.
Free kick Seongnam.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Busan in the half of Seongnam.
Free kick for Busan in the half of Seongnam.
Goal kick for Busan at Tancheon Sports Complex.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Ball goes out of play for a Seongnam goal kick.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Throw-in for Seongnam close to the penalty box.
In the minute 46, Busan needs to be cautious. Seongnam have an attacking throw-in.
Tomislav Kis is on a sub for Im Seung-kyeom for Seongnam.
Seongnam takes a corner from the left.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seongnam.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Busan in the half of Seongnam.
Seongnam have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Busan goal kick.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Throw-in for Seongnam in their own half.
Free kick for Busan in their own half.
In the minute 53, In Seongnam a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Seongnam.
In the minute 57, Goal kick for Busan at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Romulo (Busan) gets a yellow card.
Busan to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
In the minute 59, Busan will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Seongnam.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Busan at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Busan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Seongnam make their first substitution with Kim Hyeon-seong replacing Kim Dong-hyeon.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Seongnam.
In the minute 66, Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Hong Si-hoo.
Great play from Seo Bo-min to set up the goal.
The away team replace Lee Kyu-seong with Park Ho-yeong.
In the minute 71, Busan takes a corner from the right.
Corner awarded to Busan.
Free kick for Busan in their own half.
In the minute 72, In Seongnam a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
Goal! Ma Sang-hoon gives Seongnam a 2-1 lead.
In the minute 78, That's a fine assist from Lee Tae-heui.
Ball safe as Busan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seongnam.
In the minute 82, Ahn Yeong-kyu is replacing Na Sangho for the home team.
Throw-in Seongnam.
Can Seongnam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Busan's half?
In the minute 83, Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lee Dong-jun is booked for the away team.
Free kick Busan.
In the minute 86, Kim Dong-woo (Busan) has received a first yellow card.
Hyeon Kim is on a sub for Lee Jung-hyub for Busan.
In the minute 88, Busan takes a corner from the left.
Seongnam have a goal kick.

In the minute 89, Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
Goal kick for Busan at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Can Busan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Seongnam's half?
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Busan.
Corner awarded to Busan.
Throw-in high up the field for Busan in Seongnam.
Throw-in for Busan in the half of Seongnam.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
